content.description:
Directions: You will now listen to several selections. Each selection will be followed by a series of questions based on the content. Select the best answer to each question from among the four choices.

NOW GET READY TO LISTEN TO THE SELECTION.

choices.label: Die Surfer waren ihnen im Weg.
Ein Haifisch war in der Nähe.

content.answer: Ein Haifisch war in der Nähe.

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Describe the literal meaning of the text.
